root.name: Lights, Camera, Party!
root.description: OverviewLights, Camera, Party! is a fast paced humorous party game for the PlayStation Move. The game has over 50 mini games with up to 8 players. Heavily influenced by Wario Ware: Smooth Moves but with Unreal Engine 3 powered 3D graphics, Lights, Camera, Party! features the Funzini Family whose house was destroyed by APE TV's crashing satellite. Gus Pacho, APE TV's owner/host invites the Funzini Family to live in his Studios and compete in a vast array of mini games in order to win the house of their dreams.Lights, Camera, Party! was released on PSN on August 28th 2012. LinksTrailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=af9q8NLe8FYfeature=player_embedded
